data.title: Excellent staff.
data.text: As a business traveler, this hotel will meet your every need. Great location, ample and convenient parking, nice breakfast, clean rooms, working wifi, and an excellent staff. I enjoyed my week here and look forward to another stay. Thank you to the staff for making my November stay so pleasant!  It was also nice to be appreciated as a Diamond guest.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We appreciate this seasoned road warrior recognizing our Excellent staff.  He of all guests, knows what good and bad hotel service is like.  We are honored he would take the time to write as well as labeling us as excellent.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great hotel!
data.text: My wife & I stayed here while visiting the Charleston /Mt. Pleasant area. This hotel is close to everything-shopping, dining, the beach & Charleston! Accommodations were great! We will most definitely stay here whenever we visit the Charleston area!

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Mr & Mrs L!  We look forward to your return!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Stay
data.text: We have stayed at this location several times and this time, the grounds and the room was extremely clean during a weekend stay. Front desk was very helpful and actually gave us an upgrade to a corner room, which is a mini suite. Would like to have pre-registered without having to download the app. Location is absolutely great and provides numerous places to eat and shop. Overall excellent stay!

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Excellent - What a great word.  We are thankful our guests used this twice oin a week to describe us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Staff,  dated rooms
data.text: I stayed in the suite, which has the kitchen and sofa. The carpet and furniture were at least 10 years old, probably more. Stains on the carpet, very old and worn couch, it just did not feel/look clean. Time to put some $$ into remodel.

data.title: Perfect for us!
data.text:
The day before Oct. 22nd, I had just finished running the Fayetteville, NC half-marathon with my grandson who's stationed at Ft. Bragg.  I was sore and my hips were shot, so I found myself limping and shuffling (picture Tim Conway) into the Hampton Inn.  I gave my name to the desk clerk and he said, "Mr. DeGhelder, I'm going to put you in room 251.

I told him that was fine and we proceeded to room 251.  It was a room for handicapped folks!  My wife and I laughed about it, but enjoy the convenience of all the room and the special shower and fold down seat.  Kind of funny sitting on the toilet and not being able to touch the floor with my feet, but what the hey!  Just kidding, I could touch the floor!  

This establishment was super clean and super neat!  They had the absolute best free breakfast I've EVER experienced at ANY hotel or motor lodge!  Cookies and fruit and coffee any time of day.

If we ever head that way again, I'll be sure to make my reservations here!  You should too!

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for this awesome inspiration for our Team Mr. DeGhelder!  To us it's not about perfect.  It's about effort.  Our Team brings effort every day to assure each one of our guests experience the difference of Southern Hospitality.  We open our arms to the review readers with hope that you will chose this destination as part of your Charleston area trip!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Beautiful Weekend in Mt. Pleasant, SC
data.text: Excellent staff, helpful and attentive, clean property, great location to the Charleston, SC area.  Quiet hotel and front desk folks efficient.  Kitchen/dining room staff made the trip a good memory.  Full of kindness and smiles!

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Ms. Barbara.  We give thanks for our guests each day. For without them we have nothing.  Y'all come on down and let us add to your getaway experience!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: 3 Nite Stay
data.text:
Overall, better than the "normal" Hampton. Really liked the extraspace/room in the King w/small kitchen area. Would prefer than bath sink was not exposed to bedroom. We agree that the staff really is a plus for this property, everyone would say hello or give welcoming comments. Breakfast again a little better than Hampton norm. Although I was a little surprised that what I believe was suppose to contain sausage gravy was empty on the 3rd morning. 
Would definitely stay again. Price/value way above places in Charleston.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you CD and we will gladly accept a better than the normal Hampton review. Our guests LOVE that sausage and biscuit gravy.  You can always leave the breakfast ladies a note to save a favorite item for you if don't intend to come down until the end of breakfast, which is 10am.   We look forward to seeing you and your guests again real soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent stsy
data.text: Great place to stay in Charleston.  The rooms were very well decorated and clean.  The hotels appearance was lovey and charming.  Very well located in the Mount Pleasant area with close retail and shopping at the Town Center Shopping Center and wonderful restaurants in walking distance  Make sure you check out Ethan Allen while you are there its with in 500 feet of the hotel.  Internet and other amenities were very accessible.  make sure you eat breakfast...you will love the southern charm.  The cook was my favorite part...I think her name was Isabella.  Loved her.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Brian. We love shopping at Ethan Allen too!  We agree the best ingredient we add to the breakfast is southern charm.  Its a unique flavor that cant be recreated!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wedding weekend
data.text:
My family spent the last 4 days at this hotel; aunts/uncles, grandparents, & my family including 2 toddlers. The entire staff was wonderful. Check-in was a breeze, housekeeping was very friendly & helpful, and the ladies working the continental breakfast were a blessing. They helped me get food for my elderly grandparents & my 3 yr twin boys. I could not have done without those 2 sweet ladies!! Thank you for your cheerful spirit on such a hectic morning!

Location was perfect for us as we were traveling between Charleston, Folly Beach, a family beach house on Isle of Palms, & the Dunes West Golf Course. Lots of shopping & restaurants near by!

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive feedback Ms. Angie!  We really enjoyed having your family with us and hope to see you next time,  on vacation where there is no schedule!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great location and value
data.text: A great location for busy holiday beach trip.  Getting to the Isle of Palms beach during the crowded summer holidays can be alot of work with the heavy traffic.  This location offers direct access to the Isle of Palms Connector off of Hwy 17 which takes you to the North end of the beach.  There is also the adjacent Towne Center for shopping and with good restaurant options.  This facility is very clean, with comfortable beds and a very helpful staff.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for this great review jsmcc1!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Relaxing stay - good value
data.text: We were in town for a weekend wedding in Charleston, but the downtown hotels were super expensive.  We opted to stay in Mt. Pleasant which was a pretty drive only 15-20 minutes away.  Great shopping in the area and easy to get around.  The hotel staff was friendly and made us feel welcome and appreciated.  The value was great, less than half of what we would have paid to stay in downtown Charleston.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Wendy's right folks.  It's worth a few extra minutes away from the Historic District to save a bundle!  Plus we serve Southern Hospitality 24/7 for free!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Review
data.text:
I really like this hotel as I stayed here this past June. However, a little different from my most recent stay. More disorganized and some questionable clientele. 
Do not come here if you want a great night's sleep, you'I'll only get it between 3a-6a. But Isabelle, Marilyn, Murray, Rosalee, and Trish are top notch staff!

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We appreciate this feedback PeeteePod.  We want to apologize for the noise caused by a particular wedding group and assure everyone that we do our very best to control noise once we are notified of a concern.  We recognize that this particular groups celebration is not a common practice of most wedding groups.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Restful stay!
data.text: The friendly staff & clean, quiet rooms made our stay very enjoyable.  Great location!  Next door to grocery store & town      center. Easy access to Sullivan, Folly & Isle of Palms (islands) & Charleston.  We loved the bountiful breakfast in the lobby each morning. Nice outdoor pool, business center & laundry.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Great review Ms. Carol! We're located right in the heart of everything good. Y'all come see what she's talking about!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Heading to Bulls Island
data.text: Perfect , easy location to stay overnight for our destination the next day. Beds are dreamy.  Food very good. Staff gracious and helpful. This hotel was overall excellent quality and value; we'd stay again.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Bulls Island Rocks!  You can only get there by boat on certain days and pack plenty food.  It's a nature lover's dream excursion and we are the closest hotel!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Thank you John!
data.text:
Thumbs up and a big thank you to John and the staff!  My husband left his wallet on the nightstand and John made sure it reached the airport for us. He also handled a tough situation with noisy repair work from hurricane Matthew that needed to be done early.  He offered compensation when it wasn't asked for or expected to make sure we felt taken care of.  We loved the breakfast ladies cheery good mornings too.
The kindness and generosity were greatly appreciated!

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are grateful to of had the opportunity to impress this guest despite our recovery efforts from hurricane Matthew.  We hope the review readers understand that our staff go the extra mile to earn your hard earned dollars!  Booking this hotel is the right decision!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Visitor
data.text: We came to Mount Pleasant for a family vacation and to visit friends. The location of the hotel was very convenient. The staff of the hotel was very friendly and helpful. Our suite was spacious and nice. The breakfast area was also spacious and convenient. There were restaurants, shopping and gas stations close to the hotel. Overall, it was a great place to stay and we would definitely stay there again if we returned to Mount Pleasant..

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Central to everything you could wish for in this area.  The only thing we are missing is you, the review reader.  Y'all come on over and relax with us!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stay during kid's fall break!
data.text: The staff at this hotel was outstanding!   We were treated to genuine ssouthern hospitality from the moment we walked in to this clean and well maintained hotel, until the time we left.  The ladies who were working in the breakfeast area in the morning were truly outstanding customer service professionals that are increasingly rare to find in many hotels nowadays.  I absolutely recommend this hotel to other families or business travelers visiting the area.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Jennifer made our Team's day with this glowing review.  We work so hard to assure you have nothing to worry about. Our Staff go out of their way to be sure you leave with positive memories.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Southern hospitality
data.text: recent stay during hurricane Matthew for family wedding.  Staff extremely accommodating and super friendly.  clean rooms,  beautiful common areas, true southern hospitality from all the staff our entire stay

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share this great experience during the hurricane.  We know the bride and groom were fortunate you have you here when many couldn't get here if the wanted.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent
data.text: We cannot thank the staff at the Hampton Inn Mt Pleasan/Isle of Palms enough.  We stayed at the hotel to secure ourselves for when hurricane Mathew hit Charleston.  The staff (front desk, food service, support, etc...) was unbelievablely accommodating and calm during the this time of uncertainty. The rooms and lobby were extremely comfortable. It was truly a pleasant stay and would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are so grateful to have such wonderful Team Members who chose to stay behind and care for our guests during Hurricane Matthew!

owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: GREAT LOCATION
data.text: We were on our way to Myrtle Beach and spent the night here.  The room  was nice and as usual, breakfast is included with the stay.  What was really nice was that there is a shopping center behind the hotel that has everything.  We got there early enough to go to the movies.  After the movie we walked around and had to go to TCBY shop. I had no idea there was a TCBY shop and treated my kids to the original frozen yogurt experience.

owner_response.author: J B, General Manager at Hampton Inn and Suites Charleston/Mt. Pleasant-Isle Of Palms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Ms. Christine!  We really enjoyed serving you and your family and hope that next time we will be your destination, instead of Myrtle Beach!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
